#include <iostream>
#include<stdint.h>
#include<fstream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,te=0;
	cin>>t;
	do
	{
	    uint64_t n,pro=1,i,num;
	    cin>>n;
	    for (i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        cin>>num;
	        num%=1000000007;
	        pro=(pro*num)%1000000007;
	    }
	    cout<<pro<<endl;
	    te++;
	}
	while(te<t);
	return 0;
}
